passage_text: Part of the series: Horse Training. Hooking up a horse harness involves placing the breast collar, saddle, breeching and bridle on the horse, and then looping the cart shafts into the harness lines. Attach a harnessed horse to a cart with tips from a professional horse trainer in this free video on horse tack.
